page.title: 05Religious Life N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: Within our area there are many {churches}representing a wide variety of Christian belief. Most churches have 2 services on a{Sunday}and some hold other services during the week- often to study the{Bible.}Many of those responsible for the organisation of congregations have seen the importance of the church being involved in the community at all levels-amongst{the young}-cubs,scouts, B.B.'s,Brownies,Guides;{the old}-'over 60' clubs, coffee mornings etc; and {those in need}of help and support from the church. The church we know most about is{Davidson's Mains Parish {Church.}It was built in 1948 and D.Mains Primary School attends a service there at the end of each term. The present minister is the{Rev.James {Monaghan}and he comes into the school to take our morning services.
